battleships.logic

Class Battleships

  • java.lang.Object
    • battleships.logic.Battleships

  • public class Battleships
extends Object
    Class contains the main functionality of the Battleships game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Battleships(int mode, int fleetSize)
      Method constructs an implementation of the class and initialises variables according to parameters.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Boolean didPlayerWin(Player player)
      Method checks if the player given as parameter has won.
      int getMode()
      Method returns the gamemode, 1 if human vs ai, 2 if human vs human.
      Player getPlayer1()
      Method returns player1.
      Player getPlayer2()
      Method returns player2.
      Player getPlayerInTurn()
      Method returns player whose turn it is.
      Boolean hasPlayerFinishedPlacingShips(Player player)
      Method determines if player sent as parameter has a full fleet of ships.
      void newFleet(Player player)
      Method creates a full fleet of ships to player sent as a parameter.
      Boolean newShip(int x, int y, int orientation, int size, Player player)
      Method creates a new Ship to player1 until player1's fleet is full, then continues to deliver new Ships to player2 until their fleet is full.
      Ship play(int x, int y)
      Method calls the shoot() method of the opponent to shoot at the opponent's fleet.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Battleships

        public Battleships(int mode,
                   int fleetSize)
        Method constructs an implementation of the class and initialises variables according to parameters.
        Parameters:
        mode - Number that decides if the game initialises as human vs ai or human vs human,
        fleetSize - The amount of ships that each player can have in their fleet.

    • Method Detail

      • getPlayer1

        public Player getPlayer1()
        Method returns player1.
        Returns:
        player1

      • getPlayer2

        public Player getPlayer2()
        Method returns player2.
        Returns:
        player2

      • getPlayerInTurn

        public Player getPlayerInTurn()
        Method returns player whose turn it is.
        Returns:
        Player

      • getMode

        public int getMode()
        Method returns the gamemode, 1 if human vs ai, 2 if human vs human.
        Returns:
        Player

      • didPlayerWin

        public Boolean didPlayerWin(Player player)
        Method checks if the player given as parameter has won.
        Parameters:
        player - The player whose situation is requested
        Returns:
        True if the opponent lost, otherwise false

      • play

        public Ship play(int x,
                 int y)
        Method calls the shoot() method of the opponent to shoot at the opponent's fleet. If the player in turn is AI the method will replace the parameter values with coordinates returned by the AI class.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the square the player wants to shoot
        y - The y coordinate of the square the player wants to shoot
        Returns:
        The Ship that was hit or null if no Ship was hit

      • newShip

        public Boolean newShip(int x,
                       int y,
                       int orientation,
                       int size,
                       Player player)
        Method creates a new Ship to player1 until player1's fleet is full, then continues to deliver new Ships to player2 until their fleet is full. Method will not add new ships to an AI player.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate indicating the starting point of the ship
        y - the y coordinate indicating the starting point of the ship
        orientation - The orientation of the Ship, 0 horizontal, 1 vertical
        size - the size of the ship
        player - the player that will receive the ship
        Returns:
        True if the Ship was successfully added to the fleet of a player, otherwise false

      • newFleet

        public void newFleet(Player player)
        Method creates a full fleet of ships to player sent as a parameter.
        Parameters:
        player - the player that will receive the fleet

      • hasPlayerFinishedPlacingShips

        public Boolean hasPlayerFinishedPlacingShips(Player player)
        Method determines if player sent as parameter has a full fleet of ships.
        Parameters:
        player - The player in process of setting their ships
        Returns:
        True if the player has a full fleet of ships, otherwise false
